thread.title: And Now a Shooting at NAU

author: Absolute Zero
title: And Now a Shooting at NAU
text: And Now a Shooting at NAU Quote: One person was killed and three others were wounded after a gunman opened fire at Northern Arizona University early Friday, school officials said. The shooter was is in custody, and the campus in Flagstaff is not on lockdown, the school said in a statement. The three wounded were being treated at Flagstaff Medical Center, the school said. Officials said the 1:20 a.m. attack happened outside the Mountain View Hall dormitory. That is where most of the schoolÂ’s fraternity members live.
